about_the_game: The game soundtrack is crafted by the well-known Chinese game music brand, XIAOXU MUSIC. This pack contains 38 original tracks for the game. It takes you on a journey through Dongting's misty waves, Hanyang Ironworks, rainy Yangzhou, bustling Shanghai, and all the other thrilling tunes.
